As a Special Education Teachers, Middle School with Ph.D., your work involves teach academic, social, and life skills to middle school students with learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. includes teachers who specialize and work with students who are blind or have visual impairments; students who are deaf or have hearing impairments; and students with intellectual disabilities.
